T02D3282:28b-1: kri shna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam /
T02D3282:28b-3: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3282:28b-4: dang po'i zhig bde ba'i stan la nye bar gnas
T02D3282:28b-5: par gyur ba'i sgrub pa pos yi ge aam dmar
T02D3282:28b-6: po las nges par grub pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3282:28b-7: rang gi snying la rnam par bsgom la /
T02D3282:28b-8: de'i steng du yi ge h'um mthing nag rnam par bkod de /
T02D3282:28b-9: h'um gi 'od zer gyis gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i bla ma dang /
T02D3282:28b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmigs la /
T02D3282:28b-12: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod cing phyag kyang 'tshal la /
T02D3282:28b-13: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams
T02D3282:28b-14: byas te stong pa nyid bsgom par bya bas na
T02D3282:28b-15: / aom stong pa nyid ye shes kyi rdo rje'i
T02D3282:28b-16: bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nga yin no bar
T02D3282:28b-17: / ro // de'i rjes la yi ge aom dmar
T02D3282:28b-18: po las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D3282:28b-20: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rjes mtshan pa'i
T02D3282:28b-21: dbyug to sngon po yi ge h'um legs par gnas
T02D3282:28b-22: pa rnam par bsgom par byas la //
T02D3282:28b-23: yi ge h'um gi 'od zer gyis bskul ba'i de
T02D3282:28b-24: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa sngon du 'gro
T02D3282:28b-25: ba can gyis de dag thams cad yongs su gyur
T02D3282:28b-26: pa las brkyang bskum gyis gyur pa'i gshin rje gshed
T02D3282:28b-27: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i gzugs kyis padma 'dab ma
T02D3282:28b-28: brgyad sna tshogs pa'i steng na nyi ma la bzhugs
T02D3282:28b-29: nas ma hi rsha la bcibs pa bsgom par bya
T02D3282:28b-30: ba'o // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar
T02D3282:28b-31: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um yongs su
T02D3282:28b-32: gyur pa las h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbyug
T02D3282:28b-34: yi ge h'um las kun nas byung ba'i 'od zer
T02D3282:28b-35: gyis skye dgu rnams kun du snang bar byas nas
T02D3282:28b-36: slar yang de nyid la legs par gzhug go //
T02D3282:28b-37: rim pa de de lta bu dag gis ji srid
T02D3282:28b-38: 'dod kyi bar du spro ba dang bsdu bar yang
T02D3282:29a-1: tshig la sogs pa cho ga bzhin du byas pa
T02D3282:29a-2: sngon du 'gro bas thun tshod gnyis sam gsum mas
T02D3282:29a-3: bzhir de ltar bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3282:29a-4: aom hr'i:shtri:bi kri t'an na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3282:29a-5: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzla bar bya ba'o //
T02D3282:29a-6: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs so /
